attributes.action: Make the governments aware that we don't want a force vaccine
attributes.additional_details: because the people don't want a force vaccine which is against our human rights.
attributes.background: We the people don't want a force vaccine... nor do we want to lose are rights to work, drive, go shopping or be abused for not having the vaccine

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957
